`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`const fs = require("fs");
const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(0).toString().trim().split("\\n");

const edgeNum = Number(fileContent[0]);
const edges = fileContent.slice(1, edgeNum);
const queries = fileContent.slice(edgeNum + 1);

const graph = Array.from({ length: edgeNum + 1 }, () => []);
edges.forEach((edge) => {
  const [from, to] = edge.split(" ").map(Number);
  graph[from].push(to);
  graph[to].push(from);
});

let result = "";
queries.forEach((query) => {
  const [t, k] = query.split(" ").map(Number);
  if (t === 1) {
    result += graph[k].length > 1 ? "yes\\n" : "no\\n";
  } else {
    result += "yes\\n";
  }
});

console.log(result);
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-1c418913-6d69-47f1-9cee-e5e1c5c84edb.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-1c418913-6d69-47f1-9cee-e5e1c5c84edb.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this),`
